title: Jonathan Kodjia: Aston Villa sign Bristol City striker for initial £11m fee - BBC Sport
snippet: Aston Villa have signed Bristol City striker Jonathan Kodjia on a four-year deal, for an initial £11m that may rise to a Championship record fee of £15m.
